Text:
Won my most recent court case brought by a well-known adult filmmaker.  He lost on a technicality and PB has promised to provide support for gay videos.  We'll take it one day at at time. :-)

I can only ask that if you are a timid or closeted gay person that you step forward at every opportunity and make your voice heard.  We can do it, we just need to work together as a team, as the community that we are!
So fucking true, MikeXRyan!! Nice to see you again!!
